name: Paas
culture_notes: Dialect: Coastal Tongues with Riveric loanwords
Cuisine: salted fish, kelp preserves, ash-cured meats
Customs: low-tide ancestor offerings, tide-festival processions
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind-influence; navigational auguries limited
notes: harbor exposed to seasonal storms; land approach via tidal road at low tide
local economy tied to nearby trade routes but vulnerable to blockades
